message:
Here's an even newer thing on the SCMLA table: 

A PROTEST Digest, of all things.

Seems like European-style economic protest has finally hit the Western Hemisphere... & all at once.

Sheesh. There's been so much protest news the last few days we can hardly keep up with it all.

Hence, the Digest.

We've even thrown in some analysis, a "flashback" & the McGovern scuffle to boot.

And it looks like the Wisconsin protests were somewhat on the false-flaggy/orchestrated side, just to make things interesting. (Never let a crisis go to waste... ahem) Which made for some great TV soundbites, I'm sure. (Not to denigrate the sincere folks who took part. We don't blame them.)

With hyperinflation setting in & folks beginning to realize that everything is slipping through their fingers... We're probably going to see a lot more unrest before this is over, unfortunately.

-- Kim M.

____________________________________

PROTEST Digest: February 19, 2011

Alex Jones: NWO orchestrated protests
http://bit.ly/eG9Nqu
Feb 18

http://bit.ly/hvMdCV
